choose.when: INSERT INTO board VALUES (null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(g_no), 0) + 1 FROM board a ), 1, 0, #{userId })

mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, contents, hit, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_id FROM board WHERE id = #{id};

choose.otherwise: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board b WHERE b.contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
